data.name: EmptySequenceStore
data.value: The configured task sequence store is empty.

data.name: HalNotFound
data.value: The system could not determine the type of the HAL.

data.name: NoRegistryHive
data.value: "{0}" does not designate or does not begin with a valid registry hive.

data.name: NoVdsServiceLoader
data.value: The service loader for the Virtual Disk Services does not implement the expected interface.

data.name: OpenRegistryFailed
data.value: Failed to open the registry path "{0}".

data.name: PhaseAlreadySet
data.value: The phase has already been set to {0}.

data.name: SequenceNotInStore
data.value: The specified task sequence "{0}" has not been found in the task sequence store.

data.name: TsStoreNotFound
data.value: The task sequence store at "{0}" could not be found.

data.name: WaitVdsFailed
data.value: Failed waiting for Virtual Disk Service to become ready.

data.name: InvalidWindowsPeDirectory
data.value: The directory holding Windows PE is invalid.

data.name: InvalidIsoOutput
data.value: The output location for the ISO to create is invalid.

data.name: UnexpectedPhase
data.value: The specified task sequence is for phase {0}, but a task sequence for phase {1} was expected.

data.name: InvalidMountPoint
data.value: "{0}" is not a valid mount point.

data.name: InvalidImage
data.value: "{0}" is not a valid image.

data.name: ImageAlreadyMounted
data.value: There can only be one WIM image mounted at a time. Unmount "{0}" to mount a new one.

data.name: InvalidDeploymentShare
data.value: A valid location for the deployment share is required.

data.name: DeploymentShareAlreadyExists
data.value: A file already exists at the desired location "{0}" for the deployment share.

data.name: DeploymentShareNotEmpty
data.value: The desired location "{0}" for the deployment share is not empty.

data.name: InvalidHiveMountPoint
data.value: The path "{0}" does not designate a valid mount point for a registry hive.

data.name: MissingRegistryKey
data.value: The registry key "{0}" does not exist.

data.name: MissingWimMount
data.value: A mounted WIM image was expected to be stored in "{0}", but was not found.

data.name: CannotDeleteDefaultValue
data.value: The default value of a registry cannot be deleted.

data.name: MissingRegistryValue
data.value: A value registry value must be provided unless the value is to be deleted.

data.name: NotAdministrator
data.value: The task sequence requires elevation, but the process is not running as administrator.

data.name: NoDismSession
data.value: A DISM image needs to be opened before this operation can be performed.

data.name: DuplicateDismSession
data.value: A DISM servicing session has already been opened.

data.name: InexistentXPath
data.value: The element selected by the XPath expression "{0}" does not exist.

data.name: NonUniqueXPath
data.value: The XPath expression "{0}" did match more than element.

data.name: InexistentUnattend
data.value: The specified path "{0}" did not specify a valid unattend file or an architecture-independent template for such.

data.name: TypeNotTask
data.value: The type "{0}" exists, but it is not a task.

data.name: TaskNotFound
data.value: The task type "{0}" does not exist.

data.name: UnexpectedParameterType
data.value: The type of a deserialised parameter was none of the expected ones.

data.name: MissingTaskType
data.value: The task object does not have the mandatory Type property.

data.name: FailedCreateBcdStore
data.value: The BCD store \"{0}\" could not be created. Make sure that the store does not already exist.

data.name: InvalidWimHandle
data.value: The handle for the WIM file is invalid or closed.

data.name: DiskNotFound
data.value: A disk with ID "{0}" could not be found on the system.

data.name: UnexpectedFirmware
data.value: The partition step has no default schema for {0} firmware.

data.name: NoSystemDrive
data.value: The system drive could not be determined.

data.name: NoBootDrive
data.value: The boot drive could not be determined.

data.name: UnsupportedInstallationDisk
data.value: The installation disk provided is not of a supported type.

data.name: NoVolumePath
data.value: It was not possible to determine any device path for the volume.

data.name: NoAdvancedDisk
data.value: The operation cannot be performed, because the underlying disk descriptor is not an advanced one.

data.name: UnsupportedPartitionStyle
data.value: The partition style "{0}" is not supported by the task.

data.name: NoPack
data.value: The disk management uses VDS, but the provider did not have any pack, which is required to initialise a disk.

data.name: DiskLost
data.value: While refreshing the disks in the system, the disk with ID {0} did get lost.

data.name: NoVdsDisk
data.value: The specified disk was not obtained from the VDS disk management service.

data.name: GptPartitionNameMissing
data.value: A GPT partition requires a name to be specified

data.name: GptPartitionTypeMissing
data.value: A GPT partition requires a partition type specified as GUID.

data.name: MbrPartitionTypeMissing
data.value: An MBR partition requires a partition type to be specified.

data.name: UnexpectedManagementClass
data.value: An object of class "{0}" was expected, but one of class "{1}" was provided.
